comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her husband's wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calvin_Mooers An oral history with Calvin and Charlotte Mooers, conducted in 1993, talking about their work: conservancy.umn.edu/handle/107510 Their daughter, Edith Mooers, is also a computer scientist; she was in the cast of the early-1970s children's TV series "ZOOM." www.imdb.com/name/nm0600548/
